content:
This post tests the Obsidian-style tagging feature.
Existing Tags Here is a link to an existing tag: [[web-dev]]. It should appear bold and colored (Emerald/Green).
Missing Tags Here is a link to a new/missing tag: [[space-travel]]. It should appear bold and gray.
Standard Links Here is a standard link: Google. It should appear as a normal link.
This is a tiny test What should [[happen]] here?
LaTeX Test Inline equation: $E = mc^2$
Block equation: $$ \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-x^2} dx = \sqrt{\pi} $$Image Embed Test Here is a test image: Side-by-Side Grid Test (1x2) Side-by-Side Auto-Numbering Test Test Image Site Logo
title: Obsidian Tag Test

End of test.
